headline: Here's What Key Metrics Tell Us About The Hartford Insurance Group (HIG) Q4 Earnings
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for The Hartford Insurance Group (HIG) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended December 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

headline: Hartford (NYSE:HIG) Reports Bullish Q4 CY2025
summary: Insurance and financial services company The Hartford (NYSE:HIG) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 6.7% year on year to $7.34 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $4.06 per share was 26.2% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: The Hartford Reports Outstanding Fourth Quarter Earnings Of $1.1 Billion And Full Year 2025 Earnings Of $3.8 Billion
summary: HARTFORD, Conn., January 29, 2026--The Hartford (NYSE: HIG) today announced financial results for the fourth quarter and year ended Dec. 31, 2025.
